snippet: Stocks reversed course late in the afternoon after advancing most of the day on positive deal news, including that FedEx was buying a large European rival.
abstract: Stocks fall in late trading following early advance, dragged down especially by declines in utilities and consumer discretionary stocks.
lead_paragraph: Stocks reversed course late in the afternoon after advancing most of the day on positive deal news, including that FedEx was buying a large European rival.

headline.main: Shares Retreat on Eve of Earnings Season
headline.print_headline: Shares Retreat on Eve of Earnings Season
